TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ValueType extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供實值類型的基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for value types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫虛擬方法，從與實值類型的更適當實作。 overrides the virtual methods from with more appropriate implementations for value types. 另請參閱，後者繼承自。See also , which inherits from . 資料類型分成實值類型和參考型別。Data types are separated into value types and reference types. 可能是堆疊配置或配置結構中的內嵌實值類型。Value types are either stack-allocated or allocated inline in a structure. 參考型別是堆積配置。Reference types are heap-allocated. 參考和值的類型衍生自的超基底類別。Both reference and value types are derived from the ultimate base class . 在其中是所需的行為類似物件實值類型的情況下，包裝函式，它會看起來像是參考物件都會配置到堆積上，和值類型的值複製到其中的實值型別。In cases where it is necessary for a value type to behave like an object, a wrapper that makes the value type look like a reference object is allocated on the heap, and the value type's value is copied into it. 讓系統知道它包含實值類型，則會標示為包裝函式。The wrapper is marked so the system knows that it contains a value type. 這個程序稱為 boxing 和 unboxing 稱為相反的處理序。This process is known as boxing, and the reverse process is known as unboxing. Boxing 和 unboxing 可讓任何型別視為物件。Boxing and unboxing allow any type to be treated as an object. 雖然是隱含的基底類別的實值類型，您無法建立繼承自一個類別直接。Although is the implicit base class for value types, you cannot create a class that inherits from directly. 相反地，個別的編譯器提供了語言關鍵字，或建構 (例如`struct`在 C# 和`Structure`...`End Structure`Instead, individual compilers provide a language keyword or construct (such as `struct` in C# and `Structure`…`End Structure` 在 Visual Basic) 來支援實值類型的建立。in Visual Basic) to support the creation of value types. 除了做為實值型別在.NET Framework 中，基底類別結構通常不會使用直接在程式碼中。Aside from serving as the base class for value types in the .NET Framework, the structure is generally not used directly in code. 不過，它可以當做方法呼叫中的參數對數值類型，而不是所有的物件，執行限制的可能引數，或允許的方法來處理許多不同的值類型。However, it can be used as a parameter in method calls to restrict possible arguments to value types instead of all objects, or to permit a method to handle a number of different value types. 下列範例說明如何防止參考型別傳遞至方法。The following example illustrates how prevents reference types from being passed to methods. 它會定義名為類別`Utility`，其中包含四個方法： `IsNumeric`，這表示它的引數是否為一個數字，`IsInteger`，這表示它的引數是否為整數的類型，`IsFloat`，這表示它的引數是否為浮點數，與`Compare`，表示兩個數值之間的關聯性。It defines a class named `Utility` that contains four methods: `IsNumeric`, which indicates whether its argument is a number; `IsInteger`, which indicates whether its argument is an integer; `IsFloat`, which indicates whether its argument is a floating-point number; and `Compare`, which indicates the relationship between two numeric values. 在每個案例中，方法參數屬於類型，且無法參考型別傳遞至方法。In each case, the method parameters are of type , and reference types are prevented from being passed to the methods. [!code-csharp[System.ValueType.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.valuetype.structure/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ValueType.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.valuetype.structure/vb/example1.vb#1)] 下列範例說明的方法的呼叫`Utility`類別。The following example illustrates calls to the methods of the `Utility` class. [!code-csharp[System.ValueType.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.valuetype.structure/cs/example1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ValueType.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.valuetype.structure/vb/example1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 要與目前執行個體比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with the current instance.

summary.span: 指示這個執行個體和指定的物件是否相等。

span.span: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.

returns.span: 如果 和這個執行個體為同型別並表示相同的值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if and this instance are the same type and represent the same value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法覆寫，並提供.NET Framework 中的所有實值類型的值是否相等的預設實作。The method overrides and provides the default implementation of value equality for all value types in the .NET Framework. 如果沒有目前的執行個體的欄位和`obj`是參考類型，方法比較位元組的兩個物件的記憶體中。If none of the fields of the current instance and `obj` are reference types, the method performs a byte-by-byte comparison of the two objects in memory. 否則，它會反映使用要比較之對應欄位`obj`與這個執行個體。Otherwise, it uses reflection to compare the corresponding fields of `obj` and this instance. > [!TIP] > 特別是當您實值型別包含參考類型的欄位，您應該覆寫方法。Particularly if your value type contains fields that are reference types, you should override the method. 這可以提升效能，並讓您以更密切地表示等號比較類型的意義。This can improve performance and enable you to more closely represent the meaning of equality for the type. ## 附註 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]Notes for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 當您呼叫方法[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]結構，它會提供預設行為不覆寫的實值型別。When you call the method on a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] structure, it provides the default behavior for value types that don’t override . 這是.NET Framework 所提供的支援[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)](請參閱[.NET Framework 支援的 Windows 市集應用程式和 Windows 執行階段](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md))。This is part of the support that the .NET Framework provides for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] (see [.NET Framework Support for Windows Store Apps and Windows Runtime](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md)). [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 結構無法覆寫，即使使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 中寫入，因為它們不能有方法。 structures can’t override , even if they’re written with C# or Visual Basic, because they can’t have methods. (此外，在結構[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]本身並不繼承。)不過，它們便會顯示有， ，和時您用於您的 C# 或 Visual Basic 程式碼，以及.NET Framework 提供的預設行為，這些方法的方法。(In addition, structures in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] itself don’t inherit .) However, they appear to have , , and methods when you use them in your C# or Visual Basic code, and the .NET Framework provides the default behavior for these methods. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何衍生的值類型可以覆寫方法。The following example demonstrates how the method can be overridden by a derived value type. [!code-cpp[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this instance.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，其為這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會套用到衍生自。The method applies to types derived from . 衍生型別的一個或多個欄位用來計算傳回的值。One or more fields of the derived type is used to calculate the return value. 如果您呼叫衍生型別`GetHashCode`方法，傳回的值可能不適合用來做為雜湊表中的索引鍵。If you call the derived type's `GetHashCode` method, the return value is not likely to be suitable for use as a key in a hash table. 此外，如果一或多個這些欄位的值變更時，傳回的值可能不適合用來做為雜湊表中的索引鍵。Additionally, if the value of one or more of those fields changes, the return value might become unsuitable for use as a key in a hash table. 在任一情況下，請考慮撰寫您自己實作方法，更仔細地表示類型的雜湊碼的概念。In either case, consider writing your own implementation of the method that more closely represents the concept of a hash code for the type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 和。For more information, see , and . ## 附註 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]Notes for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 當您呼叫方法[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]結構，它會提供預設行為不覆寫的實值型別。When you call the method on a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] structure, it provides the default behavior for value types that don’t override . 這是.NET Framework 所提供的支援[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)](請參閱[.NET Framework 支援的 Windows 市集應用程式和 Windows 執行階段](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md))。This is part of the support that the .NET Framework provides for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] (see [.NET Framework Support for Windows Store Apps and Windows Runtime](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md)). [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 結構無法覆寫，即使使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 中寫入，因為它們不能有方法。 structures can’t override , even if they’re written with C# or Visual Basic, because they can’t have methods. (此外，在結構[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]本身並不繼承。)不過，它們便會顯示有， ，和時您用於您的 C# 或 Visual Basic 程式碼，以及.NET Framework 提供的預設行為，這些方法的方法。(In addition, structures in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] itself don’t inherit .) However, they appear to have , , and methods when you use them in your C# or Visual Basic code, and the .NET Framework provides the default behavior for these methods. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何衍生的值類型可以覆寫方法。The following example demonstrates how the method can be overridden by a derived value type. [!code-cpp[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ValueType.Equals Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ValueType.Equals Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回此執行個體的完整類型名稱。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified type name of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法覆寫方法，並提供的預設實作`ToString`實值類型的方法。The method overrides the method and provides the default implementation of the `ToString` method for value types. (實值類型所定義的型別`struct`關鍵字在 C# 中，以及由`Structure`...`End Structure`建構在 Visual Basic 中。)在功能上，不過，實作是相同的： 方法會傳回完整限定的類型名稱。(Value types are types defined by the `struct` keyword in C#, and by the `Structure`...`End Structure` construct in Visual Basic.) Functionally, however, the implementation is that same as that of : the method returns the fully qualified type name. 實值類型所定義`struct`關鍵字在 C# 和`Structure`...`End Structure`在 Visual Basic 中的建構通常會覆寫方法以提供更有意義的字串表示的實值型別。Value types defined by the `struct` keyword in C# and the `Structure`...`End Structure` construct in Visual Basic typically override the method to provide a more meaningful string representation of the value type. 下列範例會說明其間的差異。The following example illustrates the difference. 它會定義兩個實值類型，`EmployeeA`和`EmployeeB`、 建立各自的執行個體，並呼叫其`ToString`方法。It defines two value types, `EmployeeA` and `EmployeeB`, creates an instance of each, and calls its `ToString` method. 因為`EmployeeA`結構不會覆寫方法，它會顯示完整限定的類型名稱。Because the `EmployeeA` structure does not override the method, it displays only the fully qualified type name. `EmployeeB.ToString`方法，相反地，提供有意義之物件的相關資訊。The `EmployeeB.ToString` method, on the other hand, provides meaningful information about the object. [!code-csharp[System.ValueType.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ValueType.ToString/cs/ToString2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ValueType.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.ValueType.ToString/vb/ToString2.vb#1)] 請注意，雖然列舉型別也是實值類型，它們衍生自類別，它會覆寫。Note that, although enumeration types are also value types, they derive from the class, which overrides . ## Windows 執行階段資訊Notes for the Windows Runtime 當您呼叫方法[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]結構，它會提供預設行為不覆寫的實值型別。When you call the method on a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] structure, it provides the default behavior for value types that don’t override . 這是.NET Framework 所提供的支援[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)](請參閱[.NET Framework 支援的 Windows 市集應用程式和 Windows 執行階段](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md))。This is part of the support that the .NET Framework provides for the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] (see [.NET Framework Support for Windows Store Apps and Windows Runtime](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/support-for-windows-store-apps-and-windows-runtime.md)). [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 結構無法覆寫，即使使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 中寫入，因為它們不能有方法。 structures can’t override , even if they’re written with C# or Visual Basic, because they can’t have methods. (此外，在結構[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]本身並不繼承。)不過，它們便會顯示有， ，和時您用於您的 C# 或 Visual Basic 程式碼，以及.NET Framework 提供的預設行為，這些方法的方法。(In addition, structures in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] itself don’t inherit .) However, they appear to have , , and methods when you use them in your C# or Visual Basic code, and the .NET Framework provides the default behavior for these methods.
